124146.<pipipi_high>\n「知の城塞で開かれる 知の祝祭は\n 決められた時:
The Wisdom Festival at Fort Wisdom is a simultaneous event for all participants held at a set time. When the Wisdom Festival
starts, everyone here is automatically transported to the Wisdom Festival site. In a real event, the Wisdom Festival Invite would
then be removed from your belongings when the first question begins, but since this is a trial event, nothing will be removed. Also, if
someone in your party is outside of Fort Wisdom at that time, they will be removed from the party. Also, just a reminder, if you get
disconnected during the Wisdom Festival, you will be disqualified. Before the start of the festival, please check the status of the line
in the upper left corner, and if it looks critical, it is recommended to leave Fort Wisdom. Once the festival starts, it's simple.
You have a limited time to choose the door with the number you think is correct. You have three chances to get it right, and if you get
it wrong three times, you will be ejected. You will be rewarded if you can complete all seven questions without being ejected!
